meta.bestFor: Individuals with ₹12+ lakh annual income seeking a lifetime free card with domestic travel benefits, low forex markup, and incremental reward structure. Best for monthly spenders above ₹20,000 who want to maximize 10X rewards.
meta.notRecommendedFor: Those seeking international lounge access, premium travel benefits, or high reward redemption value. Not ideal for low spenders under ₹20,000/month or those primarily using UPI/cash.
meta.verdict: A solid lifetime-free mid-tier card that offers good value for domestic travelers. Post-May 2024 devaluation, the card's reward structure has weakened with lower earning rates and additional exclusions. The low 1.99% forex markup is a standout feature, but lack of international lounge access limits its appeal for frequent international travelers. Railway lounge access and comprehensive travel insurance add value for domestic travelers. Best suited for those who can consistently spend above ₹20,000/month to unlock 10X rewards.
